name: Cursed Climb
description:
A short roguelike platformer game where you climb a cursed tower, defeating enemies and collecting items to build your strength and prepare to fight tough bosses.

Mouse and keyboard required.

The game is still in beta, so any feedback will be appreciated and there are links within the game to submit a feedback form when you reach the end of a run.

Made by Joshua Cartledge, Joshua Polkinghorne, Samuel Reuter and Matthew Schulmeister.
